RANSOMWARE IN Q2 2022: RANSOMWARE IS BACK IN BUSINESS | Digital Shadows

The second quarter of 2022 was a significant and highly active quarter for ransomware gangs. In this latest quarter, some of the biggest ransomware groups ceased operations, dangerous new gangs

items.content_html:
piyokango@piyokango Above the Fold and in Your Inbox: Tracing State-Aligned Activity Targeting Journalists, Media | Proofpoint US

Above the Fold and in Your Inbox: Tracing State-Aligned Activity Targeting Journalists, Media | Proofpoint US

Crista Giering, Joshua Miller, Michael Raggi and the Proofpoint Threat Research Team Those involved in media make for appealing targets given the unique access, information, and insights they can provide on topics of state-designated import. Proofpoint researchers have observed APT actors since early 2021 regularly targeting and posing as journalists and media organizations to advance their state-aligned collection requirements and initiatives. The identified campaigns have leveraged a variety of technique
